New Records: Klay Thompson broke the previous record for threes in a Mavericks debut with six three-pointers.
Key Match Events: Klay Thompson scored 22 points, seven rebounds, and three steals while nailing six three-pointers in 26 minutes of action.
Kyrie Irving's defensive effort against Tre Jones, including a near eight-second violation and an offensive foul call, was notable.
Naji Marshall competently bringing up the ball and setting up the offense on numerous occasions.
Luka Doncic's pass to P.J. Washington for a three that extended the Mavericks’ lead to 14.
Luka Doncic's pass to Klay Thompson for a three-pointer in the early part of the fourth quarter.
The Mavericks hit 7-of-12 from three in the third quarter.
